Articles.Content:
hi, I'm wondering if it is possible to change multiple radial-mount parachutes altitude parameter while I am flying.
I'm talking about to tweak them all at the same time with one action only, exactly like when in VAB.
Cause when I'm inflight I have to change their values as many times as there are.
it's quite tedious and meaningless, isn't it?
 

Edited December 11, 2020 by antipro

Nope, one at a time is all you can do in flight. You can, however, left click on the parachutes in the staging menu to open the collapsed stack of chutes and then right click them one by one from the stage list to adjust them, which is easier and quicker than trying to find the parts on the craft (especially if it’s moving).
